org.mini2Dx.core.game

Class ScreenBasedGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.game.GameContainer
      • org.mini2Dx.core.game.ScreenBasedGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    public abstract class ScreenBasedGame
extends GameContainer
    An implementation of GameContainer that allows for separation of a game into multiple GameScreens and provides support for Transitions between such screens via a ScreenManager

    • Field Summary
